description: A fist-sized lump of plant matter taken from a brackenwight.  It still glows a very faint green
A tangled tuft of mossling fur, more like grass or lichen than the fur of an animal.  A cow might be able to eat it, but you couldn't.
A strip of bark taken from a fallen dryad.  It's still slightly supple, as though it were attached to a living tree.
